QuestData.Title: Hippogryph Master Stephanos
QuestData.Description: Here's the box, $n. That should be enough for Chellan to get the inn up and running. Let her know that she can keep sending in orders as the need arises. Azure Watch urgently needs a place to care for the wounded and put up any travelers they receive.$B$BWhen you're ready to return to Azure Watch, seek out Stephanos near the Seat of the Naaru in the Exodar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Stephanos at the Seat of the Naaru inside the Exodar and purchase a hippogryph ride back to Azure Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: So you're headed back to Azure Watch with this package? No problem at all, $c. Just speak with me again and we'll get you on your way with those supplies.
